title: The Global Economy and Its Impact on Uruguay
summary: Montevideo, Uruguay - Citi Uruguay organized a talk for corporative clients on the global economic situation and its manifestations in Argentina and Uruguay.
tag-1: The Global Economy and Its Impact on Uruguay
tag-2: Montevideo, Uruguay – Citi Uruguay organized a talk for corporative clients on the global economic situation and its manifestations in Argentina and Uruguay.
tag-3: The conversation was led by Ricardo Dessy, Chief Economist for Citi's Southern Cluster, and Gabriel González, Treasury Manager at Citi Uruguay.
tag-4: The Argentine expert spoke about the current state of the world's economy and its impact on Argentina and Uruguay. He also devoted time to analyzing economic progress in his country and the future challenges facing both Argentina and Uruguay.
tag-5: The discussion touched on local and regional economic issues, opportunities and challenges for economic growth in Uruguay and efforts to promote Uruguay as an attractive destination for foreign investment, among other topics.
tag-6: Gabriel González followed with a talk about Uruguay's current economic situation and market outlook.
tag-7: The event, titled "A 360º Overview: The Global Economy and Its Impact on Argentina and Uruguay," was presented as part of the bank's annual series of talks for corporate clients. It was held April 26 at the Hyatt Centric.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
